reviewText: I HOPE THEY WILL EVENTUALLY RELEASE THE REST OF THIS SEASON :*(

Great episodes......we need more cartoons like these....hopefully they're more English episodes to buy great cartoons.....I have introduced this great cartoon to my 6 year old brother he like them better than square pants

With Volumen 9: Challenge accepted, Saint Seiya series really kicks off into action and to shows its best: Great fights, Amazing Secrets revealed, Beatiful Gold Saints to discover and an non expected ending! Go from Aries to all the way until Piscis to end the journey at Athena's santuary at the highest point of the Santuary! You won regret it! Get Saint Seiya as soon as posible as discover why Saint Seiya remains so popular in the whole world yet!!! Wait for Poseidon, Hades and Zeus, all Gods to fight against in the future! Saint Seiya Go!
